title: Inclusive Educational Design in Higher Education: Applying Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in completing higher education courses and basic scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Requires securing educational effectiveness in limited-tech environments while considering learner diversity

learning_goals: Applying Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles, learners propose at least three inclusive science lesson designs.
In limited technological environments, learners develop at least two inclusive educational strategies implementable via smart devices.
In higher education contexts, learners concretely propose assessment methods considering learner diversity.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
